decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision dated 06/09/2024 ref. APP/H5960/W/24/3342383.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the reports, specifications and drawings detailed 01, 17 Rev A, 18 Rev A,19 Rev A, 20 Rev A, 21 Rev A, 22 Rev A, 23 Rev A, 24 Rev A, 25 Rev A, 26 Rev A, 27 Rev A, 28 Rev A, 29 Rev A, 30 Rev A, 31 Rev A, 10 Alderbrook Road, SW12 Daylight and Sunlight Assessment Issue No.3 ref.5096 dated January 2024, planning fire safety strategy (received on 05/11/2024).

Condition : 3 - Demolition or construction works shall take place only between 08:00 and 18:00 on Monday to Friday, between 08:00 and 13:00 on Saturdays and not at all on Sundays or on Bank or Public Holidays.

Condition : 4 - The development shall be carried out with the full details of the finished levels, above ordnance datum, of the ground floor(s) of the proposed building(s), in relation to existing ground levels approved under details application ref. 2024/3527. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved levels.

Condition : 5 - Prior to the commencement of the development (including any demolition) tree protection measures in line with Arboricultural Report dated September 2023 by DPA arboricultural consultants shall be installed and no works or materials/plant storage shall be undertaken within the protected area, unless otherwise agreed in writing with the local planning authority. The protection measures shall be retained until completion of the development.

Condition : 6 - The development shall be carried out with the details / samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development approved under details application ref. 2024/3527. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details / samples.

Condition : 7 - The development shall be carried out with the scheme of hard and soft landscaping approved under details application ref. 2024/3527. All planting, seeding, turfing, and green roofs included in the approved details shall be carried out prior to the occupation of any part of the development, or in accordance with a programme agreed in writing with the local planning authority. Any trees or plants which within a period of 5 years from the completion of the development die, are removed or become seriously damaged or diseased shall be replaced in the next planting season with others of similar size and species.

Condition : 8 - The development shall be carried out with the photovoltaic panels and photovoltaic tiles approved under details application ref. 2024/3527 to show how the renewable energy carbon savings are to be achieved. The photovoltaic panels shall be installed in accordance with the approved details prior to first occupation of the development hereby permitted and retained and maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 9 - The building hereby permitted shall not be occupied until the windows in the side elevations at ground, first, second and third floor levels have been fitted with obscured glazing, and no part of those windows that are less than 1.7 metres above the floor of the room in which it is installed shall be capable of being opened. Details of the type of obscured glazing shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority before the window is installed and once installed the obscured glazing shall be retained thereafter.

Condition : 10 - The development shall be carried out with the boundary treatment approved under details application ref. 2024/3527. The boundary treatment shall be completed as in accordance with the approved details before the building is occupied.

Condition : 11 - No dwelling shall be occupied until the cycle parking shown on the approved plan Ref: 31 Rev A shall be provided and be retained for cycle parking purposes for the users of the development and for no other purpose.

Condition : 12 - Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby permitted, the refuse and recycling storage shown on approved plan Ref: 30 Rev A shall be provided and shall be retained for the users of the development and for no other purpose.

Condition : 13 - The development hereby approved shall achieve a minimum of a 35% reduction in CO2 emissions above the levels set in Building Regulations Part L 2021. The development shall be carried out with the evidence approved under details application ref. 2024/3527 demonstrating that the development has achieved at least a 35% reduction in CO2 emissions above the levels set in Building Regulations Part L 2021.  The installed measures shall be retained in accordance with the approved details unless otherwise agreed by the local planning authority.

Condition : 14 - The development shall achieve a maximum water use of 110 litres per person per day for homes (including an allowance of five litres or less per person per day for external water consumption) in line with the Water Efficiency Calculator for new dwellings from the Department of Housing, Communities and Local Government.  The development shall be carried out with the water usage approved under details application ref. 2024/3527 to demonstrate that the internal water consumption of the development will not exceed 105l/p/day. The approved measures shall be retained for the lifetime of the development.

Condition : 15 - The development shall be carried with the gas boiler approved under details application ref. 2024/3527 to show how the renewable energy carbon savings are to be achieved. The gas boiler shall be installed in accordance with the approved details prior to the occupation of the development and retained and maintained as such unless otherwise agreed by the local planning authority.

Condition : 16 - INFORMATIVE: In dealing with this application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive manner and the Council has, as far as practicable, sought solutions to problems arising in relation to dealing with the planning application. The Council has made available detailed advice in the form of its statutory policies in the Local Plan (2023) as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably. In addition, where appropriate, further guidance was offered to the applicant during the processing of the application.
description: Variation of condition 2 (in accordance with approved plans) of planning permission dated 06/09/2024 ref 2023/3162 (Appeal) (Demolition of existing two storey property and erection of three storey property with roof accommodation and creation of 5 self-contained flats (2 x 3-bed, 1 x 2-bed, 2 x 1-bed/1-Person) with outside amenity space and associated refuse and cycle storage) to allow alterations to internal layouts and installation of new windows to side elevations.
